title: Obsidian Enhanced Audio Player
description: Enhanced Audio Player plugin for obsidian. Part of my plugin suite for language learning in obsidian.

title: Obsidian Language Tools
description: A set of utilities for taking language notes in Obsidian. Inclusing an SRS component written in Svelte.

title: YiLang 2.0
description: YiLang helps you study new languages by providing a variety of tools for learning a variety of different content. A rewrite of YiLang with a more modern stack.

description: YiLang helps you study new languages by providing a variety of tools for learning a variety of different content.

title: Yi-8
description: A very simple emulator for the CHIP-8 architecture.
